title: Online Education Course Based on Cognitive Apprenticeship Model for Strengthening Clinical Pharmacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmaceutical theory and drug mechanism of action
context.additional_context: Emphasizing real-time interaction via digital devices, enhancing practical skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Design patient-tailored medication treatment plans with over 80% accuracy through pharmaceutical clinical case analysis.
Evaluate clinical judgment skills by applying the six cognitive apprenticeship strategies (modeling, coaching, scaffolding, reflection, articulation, exploration).
Write drug interaction reports incorporating peer feedback using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
